title: Fighting The Demon: Ariyus
description: Alexis Osiris is a newbie witch, but she is in the way of the Demon King being ruler of the underworld. She keeps getting attacked by demons of all kinds intent on destroying her, even one's that aren't after her directly. In Book 1, Alexis faces Ariyus, a demon who is near invincible.
author: Ashleigh Neame
